Name: Clan Wolf
ReputationStatements: Mercenary, we understand that you have found fighting against us profitable in the past, and would like to reverse this with this batchall.
Mercenary, you have fought well against us in the past.  We would like to employ your skills in a task that furthers our goals, and offer you this batchall.
Commander, Clan Wolf have faced you in battle before, and you have proved yourself competant.  Take up this batchall and let us work together in a mutually beneficial way.
Freeborn, you are an unknown to us.  Prove yourself on the field of battle with this batchall, and we may have further use of you.
Commander, you have assisted the Wolf Clan adequately in the past.  Before we take this relationship further, we need you to perform a task for us.
Commander, you have served us admirably in the past.  I offer you this batchall knowing you will perform as well as any of our commanders.
Commander, the Wolf Clan regard you as one of our pack. I have kept this task for you, and would trust noone else to succeed.
MissionSuccessStatement: Well done Commander. Know that the Wolf Clan recognise your service, and I have transferred the agreed payment to your account.
GoodFaithFailureStatement: We expect all the tasks assigned to be completed freeborn.  However, we recognise your attempt, and provide a partial payment for your partial completion of the tasks.
BadFaithFailureStatement: You have failed, and this failure sets back our plans.  Don't expect payment, as none will be provided.
Description: The chosen Clan of Nicholas Kerensky, the Wolves have dominated Clan society since their inception. Less formal and more flexible than others, Clan Wolf emulated its namesake by blending caution with decisiveness.
